title: Lynda - UX for Business
description:
Lynda - UX for Business

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

57m 23s Beginner Nov 19, 2015   | Uploaded in Dec 11, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Web 
Author: Chris Nodder 
 
A great small business website doesn't start with HTML code. It starts with planning a great user experience: deciding what content to show online, how to describe your business, and how to help customers find the information they need. UX design may sound complicated at first, but it's actually a very simple process of putting the customer first: the primary tenet of any good business.â€¨â€¨Join Chris Nodder, as he reviews the key components of an effective small business website, whether you maintain your website or hire someone else. He provides guidelines to optimize the content, design, and information architecture of the site and to provide customers and prospective customers with incentives to trust your businessâ€”and buy from it.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Keeping the homepage simple
	â€¢	Providing news and links
	â€¢	Using pictures and testimonials to establish trust
	â€¢	Creating clear product descriptions
	â€¢	Showing expertise with a blog or tips page
	â€¢	Soliciting ongoing feedback
